1.title: Story idea plot

11.content:
“Crystal” a “Cute Young Adult Human Female" who at “Standing Height Is 5’7” while “Roughly 130 Pounds” with “Long Red Hair” and “Soft Smooth Fair Tone Skin” and a “Full Body Shape”.

While “She Believed Herself Secure” in the “Privacy” of “Her Own House” the “Chubby Primary” was “Lurking Among” the “Shadows”.

Ready to “Add Her” to its “Steadily Growing Empire” of “Impossibly Cute” and “Healthy” yet “Obedient Young Adult Human Female Servants” that were in “Obese Plus Condition”.

The “Chubby Primary” had “Transported Crystal” just as “She” was “Leaving” the “Bathroom” in “Her Pink Two-Piece Pajamas while “Approaching Her Bed Without Her Knowing”.

Just “Before Starting” to “manipulate” the “Mind” of “Crystal” and the “Fat Cells Throughout Her Young Adult Human Female Body” the “Conversion Would Only” be a “Matter” of Human Minutes”.

Next

or

11.title: My storyline Crystal's Weight Gain Pleasure

15.content: Yours storyline idea plots continue
15.title: Your storyline plot

choices: Jenny is hit with hunger pains
151.content:
Jenny Bridges is a dietitian devoted to her work. Yearning to slim every woman down, Jenny worked tenaciously that still in her early twenties, has already made quite a career for herself. Many women have achieved a slimmer body through Jenny's expertise. Jenny's extensive knowledge of health food has caused tons of soft fat to disappear from the world which she prides herself on.

However, things were about to drastically change for the ambitious dietitian as the hungry eyes of the "Chubby Primary" fell upon her trim figure.

The chubby Primary was a mysterious entity obsessed with female obesity. The look, the feel, the sensation of a woman's flesh titillated the powerful entity and drove it to build an empire of obese women who obediently served it. With its ability to manipulate a woman's weight along with her sense of pleasure, the Chubby Primary was more than capable of forming his fat utopia. A utopia which Jenny was soon to join.

Lurking amidst the shadows, the Chubby Primary followed Jenny as she walked to work. Jenny always walked to work as it kept her body fit. The route was filled with unhealthy fastfood joints which Jenny deemed beneath her. To the Chubby Primary these fastfood restaurants gleamed with potential. Just as Jenny was scoffing at a woman eating a breakfast burger, the fat-loving entity made its move.
151.title: The Dietitioan

1511.content:
"Yuck! What kind of self respecting woman would eat such filth." Jenny said sticking her tongue out in disgust at the burger eating woman.

"Try it."

A mysterious voice in her head said.

"Huh? Who said that?" Jenny darted her head looking to find the source.

"Eat the burgers." the voice spoke again.

"Eww why am I hearing this?" a frightened Jenny asked.

"Go inside Jenny." instructed the voice.

"W-what?" Jenny questioned.

"Go inside Jenny" the voice now adopting a more stern tone.

Jenny sheepishly entered the establishment. Unfamiliar to the stench of grease, Jenny coughed.

"No Jenny breath deeply." ordered the voice "Inhale the sensation."

Jenny obeyed and took in a huge breath of the pungent air. As the air entered the dietitian's lungs, an unusual sense of pleasure flowed through her.

"Oh that kind of feels good." Jenny apprehensively admitted.

"Breath more." instructed the Chubby Primary who was amplifying Jenny's pleasure.

After a few deep breaths, Jenny felt invigorated.

"Why... I feel so...alive. Why do I feel this way?" Jenny wondered.

Not bothering with an explanation, the Chubby Primary immediately made commands.

"Place an order Jenny."

Jenny still dumbfounded by the event taking place, walked up to the counter and placed an order.

"Yes um I'll have a burger..."

"MORE!!!!" the voice interrupted

"Uh two burg-"

"MORE!!!!!"

"And some fries and a milkshake-"

"MORE!!!!!!!!!!!!" demanded the voice.

Moments later Jenny sat at a booth with 20 burgers, 15 carton of fries, and a dozen milkshakes. All of Jenny's instincts were disgusted by the display of junk food before her, but the unyielding voice kept pushing her. Jenny was a dietitian, she knew how bad this was for her but the voice in her head proved too persistent. The chubby primary penetrated Jenny's defenses and increased her hunger. As Jenny took her first bite of the greasy burger, the chubby primary immensely amplified her pleasure. Jenny squealed in ecstasy as the high calorie bite tantalized her taste buds. Suddenly Jenny feverishly scarfed down her intimidating meal.

"Nomph nom ofph Why am I eating like this?" Jenny cried out through her mouth stuffed with fast food.

To facilitate Jenny's weight gain, the Chubby Primary enhanced Jenny's fat cells. The fat cells grew larger and more capable of storing tremendous amounts of fat. Fast and efficient, Jenny's improved fat cells safely stored all her new calories the instant her stomach filled. Far superior to their previous state, Jenny's new fat cells were invulnerable to any problems associated with obesity.

Quickly, Jenny's body thickened in her booth. Her clothes tightened causing numerous tears to occur. Oddly, the very thing she fought, now arroused the dietitian. The sensation of her clothes growing tighter, the feel of her flesh softening, the delicious taste of greasy burgers, seeing her thin body vanish under layers of flab stirred an unknown elation in Jenny.

Jenny had finished her meal. She sat in euphoria in the now undersized booth.

"Oh my... That was so goooooood." Jenny confessed.

Jenny rubbed her big belly, observing how soft it was, how much better it felt than her past flat stomach. She continued to her boobs. Her boobs were now nice and big and barely contained in her shirt. Before they were too small and to Jenny's dismay uneven in size. But now they were big, soft, and perfectly matched. Jenny than realized how comfy her seat was. It was then that she noticed how soft her ass was. No longer the flat, boney butt that became sore from sitting, now was a plump soft cushion that freed Jenny from any pain.

"I can't believe how amazing I feel!" Jenny proclaim rising from the booth.

Jenny stood as a 260 pound woman, her clothes barely clinging to her expanded physique. Jenny walked out of the restaurant noticing another sensation. Jenny's body now jiggled as she moved. The unfamiliar feeling of her flab quaking from her movements exhilarated her. She adored her bouncing boobs and her wobbling legs.

"Is it okay for me to like being so fat?' Jenny asked herself.

"Yes" answered the Chubby Primary intent on fattening Jenny more.
1511.title: Jenny starts hearing voices

choices: Jenny fattens women for the Chubby Primary
Many women are led down a fattening path
15111.content:
With tears ripping across her clothes, Jenny heaved herself from the booth. Everything was so much softer now. It was as if Jenny had become injected with warm dough.

"Oh my is that my belly?" Jenny cued.

Elation flowed through Jenny as her hands took hold of her hanging belly. The soft flesh filled her palms. Unable to resist the dietitian gave the gut a shake. Thrilled by the sensation of ripples gliding through her new fat, Jenny let out an embarrassing squeal.

"Oh I could do this forever- Gasp I have to get to work!"

Jenny than bolted out of the fast food establishment, though not before ordering another batch of burgers. Curious, despite the drastic increase in her weight, her agility didn't seem to deteriorate. Skipping her 260 pound body along the sidewalk while simultaneously biting into burgers, Jenny felt amazing though a tad hungry. With more of her clothes ripping off the bulges of copious flesh poured out. Her exposed flab only tantalized her.

Onlookers could only watch on in confusion at the sight of Jenny. How could a woman of her size be so agile? She was a fat woman fluttering on her feet showing no signs of fatigue. The skinny women found the act of skipping exhausting even the athletic women who forced themselves to suffer a stringent regiment would be red at the face from those movements. Then there was Jenny's proud exhibition. How could a woman, let alone a fat woman, be so confident to display her body like that? Jenny's ensemble was now rendered to mere rags, covering as much as a bikini. Even at the pool, women felt self-conscious of their minuscule deposits of fat to don a bikini.

Just as Jenny finished her burgers she had arrived at her office. She had a long day ahead of her with many appointments with the first about to begin. Influenced by the Chubby Primary, the dietitian had tweaked her counseling structure.
15111.title: Jenny goes to work

choices: A friendly voice calls out to Karen
Images of food fill Karen's mind
Karen thinks her husband is home
1551.content:
Karen lethargically laid in bed. "7:00pm and still not home" she moaned. Karen's husband had yet again worked late. Not that it mattered though, even when he was home, he ignored her. They simply weren't that close. Pressure from family and a foolish decision had landed Karen in an unhappy marriage. Karen would pass the lonely days sulking around the house. Her only interest was fashion. Buying cute outfits which tragically went unnoticed was what kept her going.

Karen than dragged her indifferent self into the bathroom. Studying herself in the mirror. Karen felt unappreciated. How could her husband be so uninterested. She was beautiful. With long bright brown hair, typically kept in a graceful ponytail, soft gentle skin, and a nicely proportioned body, how could any man not fawn over her? She then stepped on the scale.

"114. I lost another pound. Not that HE'D care." Karen scoffed.

Standing at 5ft6in Karen's 114 pound body was quite slim. Growing up she always thought being so thin would be supreme but lately possessing such a slender body doesn't feel so paramount.

Unbeknownst to her existed an entity, the Chubby Primary, that was very eager to free women like Karen of her desolate lives. It was there, standing in her bathroom, that Karen caught the eye of this entity and would soon have her life changed for the better....
1551.title: A Lonely Housewife

info.description:
Please read this carefully before continuing

these interactive stories "The Chubby Primary" "The Chubby Admirer Program" and "Spaceship of Weight Gain"

Are my original ideas so please do not make them your own, you may add chapters if you so choose

I will not edit your chapters unless they validate the rules that I have given.

I intend to combined

"The Chubby Primary" "The Chubby Admirer Program" and "Spaceship of Weight Gain" Into a unique single chubby admirer novel

____________________________________________________________________________________________________

The base background story
for The Chubby Primary

The “Empire” of the “Chubby Primary” is “Growing” with “Each Cute Young Adult Human Female Acquired” that “Gradually Grow Obedient” to the “Chubby Primary” the “Fatter” they “Grow”.
____________________________________________________________________________________________________

Now for rules please follow

rule one
moaning in sexual pleasure while in the process of weight gain and becoming completely nude is allowed

rule two
health and beauty with strength to move is to increase not decrease

rule three
there is to be no death and no other version of expansion. outside of weight gain

rule four
no becoming shapeless blobs of fat
